content:
{"name": "Buddhist Tzu Chi Foundation", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We also can answer questions and correct misconceptions about SNAP to help you decide if SNAP is right for you. This help is free and confidential.
Check your eligibility, please use this link: https://www.njhelps.gov/
Please call 973-857-8666 for an appointment
Please for question contact us at newjersey_charity@tzuchi.us or by phone:
For Middlesex and Monmouth Counties, please call 732-518-8405
For Camden County, please call 973-991-9703 
Required documentations for SNAP application
You MUST bring the following for everyone in your household who is applying for the application:
A valid ID (i.e. driver’s license, birth certificate, government ID)
Proof of where you live (i.e. lease, rental agreement, utility bill)
*Unless you are experiencing homelessness
Proof of earned income (i.e. paystubs, employer letter, recent tax records)
Proof of unearned income (benefits award letter)
Proof of resources (i.e. bank statements)
Social Security Number
Proof of immigration status (for non-citizens)
Proof of student status (for college students)", "email": "", "url": "https://tzuchi.us/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "150 Commerce Road", "address_2": "", "city": "Cedar Grove", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07009", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.865608, "longitude": -74.231414}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 857-8666", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of lower income required, such as your EBT card"}]}
